00002 =                                                                           =
00003 =                            MtkUpsampleMask                                =

00017 #include "MisrRegression.h"
00018 #include "MisrUtil.h"
00019 #include <stdlib.h>
00020 #include <math.h>
00021 
00036 MTKt_status MtkUpsampleMask(
00037   const MTKt_DataBuffer *Source_mask, 
00038   int Size_factor, 
00039   MTKt_DataBuffer *Result_mask 
00040 ) 
00041 {
00042   MTKt_status status_code;      /* Return status of this function */
00043   MTKt_status status;           /* Return status of called routines. */
00044   MTKt_DataBuffer result_mask_tmp = MTKT_DATABUFFER_INIT;
00045                 /* Valid mask for result. */
00046   int number_line_out;      /* Number of lines in output grid.*/
00047   int number_sample_out;    /* Number of samples in output grid.*/
00048   int iline;            /* Loop iterator. */
00049   int isample;          /* Loop iterator. */
00050 
00051   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00052   /* Argument check: Source_mask == NULL                                */
00053   /*                 Source_mask->nline < 1                             */
00054   /*                 Source_mask->nsample < 1                           */
00055   /*                 Source_mask->datatype = MTKe_uint8                 */
00056   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00057 
00058   if (Source_mask == NULL) {
00059     MTK_ERR_CODE_MSG_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR,"Source_mask == NULL");
00060   }
00061   if (Source_mask->nline < 1) {
00062     MTK_ERR_CODE_MSG_JUMP(MTK_OUTBOUNDS,"Source_mask->nline < 1");
00063   }
00064   if (Source_mask->nsample < 1) {
00065     MTK_ERR_CODE_MSG_JUMP(MTK_OUTBOUNDS,"Source_mask->nsample < 1");
00066   }
00067   if (Source_mask->datatype != MTKe_uint8) {
00068     MTK_ERR_CODE_MSG_JUMP(MTK_OUTBOUNDS,"Source_mask->datatype != MTKe_uint8");
00069   }
00070 
00071   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00072   /* Argument check:                                                    */
00073   /*   Size_factor < 1                                                  */
00074   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00075   
00076   if (Size_factor < 1) {
00077     MTK_ERR_CODE_MSG_JUMP(MTK_OUTBOUNDS,"Size_factor < 1");
00078   }
00079 
00080   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00081   /* Argument check: Result_mask == NULL                                */
00082   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00083 
00084   if (Result_mask == NULL) {
00085     MTK_ERR_CODE_MSG_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR,"Result_mask == NULL");
00086   }
00087 
00088   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00089   /* Determine size of output array.                                    */
00090   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00091 
00092   number_line_out = Source_mask->nline * Size_factor;
00093   number_sample_out = Source_mask->nsample * Size_factor; 
00094 
00095   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00096   /* Allocate memory for result                                         */
00097   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00098   
00099   status = MtkDataBufferAllocate(number_line_out, number_sample_out,
00100                  MTKe_uint8, &result_mask_tmp);
00101   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00102 
00103   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00104   /* For each location in result grid...                                */
00105   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00106 
00107   for (iline = 0; iline < number_line_out ; iline++) {
00108     for (isample = 0; isample < number_sample_out; isample++) {
00109 
00110 
00111   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00112   /* Duplicate the corresponding value in the source grid.              */
00113   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00114 
00115       result_mask_tmp.data.u8[iline][isample] = 
00116     Source_mask->data.u8[iline / Size_factor][isample / Size_factor];
00117 
00118   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00119   /* End loop for each location in result grid.                         */
00120   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00121   
00122     }
00123   }
00124 
00125   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00126   /* Return.                                                            */
00127   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00128 
00129   *Result_mask = result_mask_tmp;
00130   return MTK_SUCCESS;
00131 
00132 ERROR_HANDLE:
00133   MtkDataBufferFree(&result_mask_tmp);
00134   return status_code;
00135 }
